ygData.subject: Re: Denons Disruptive Discord
ygData.msgSnippet: duel a friend and use it on him/her with and without horn so you can see how much damage you are causing. i actually have not used it cause of the worries of
ygData.messageBody:
duel a friend and use it on him/her with and without horn so you can see how
much damage you are causing. i actually have not used it cause of the
worries of area effect songs in dungeons. but if she is doing that much
damage i may check it out now.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 41 Bard, Mithaniel Marr


-----Original Message-----
From: cltrhelm [mailto:cltrhelm@...]
Sent: Saturday, June 05, 1999 1:20 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Denons Disruptive Discord


From: cltrhelm <cltrhelm@...>

I'm an 18th level Bard on CZ. I was just curious if anybody had specific
stats on the damage done using Denons Disruptive Cord. Also, does the
damage inflicted increase with your level, your brass skill or both. I
overheard a 21 level bard say that she does 79 hp worth of damage with
this song per pulse when using her horn. I failed to ask her how she
arrived at this figure, but now that I have the song (which does work
pretty good), I wish I had. Anybody have the answer to this?

Galaline
Cazic-Thule
